mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPANY (CEO_ID, CEO_NAME, COM_NUM, COM_ID, COM_NAME, COM_ADDRESS, COM_CATEGORY, MIN_PRICE, DELIVERYPAY, FREEDELIVERY, BUSINESSTIME, DELIVERYZONE, APPDATE) VALUES (#{ceoId}, #{ceoName}, #{comNum}, (), #{comName}, #{comAddress}, #{comCateGory}, #{minPrice}, #{deliverypay}, #{freeDelivery}, #{businesstime}, #{deliveryZone}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select COM_ID comId, COM_NAME comName, APPDATE appDate from company where ceo_id=#{ceoId}
